price: আৰু জিনক সৃষ্টি কৰিছে ধোঁৱাবিহীন অগ্নিশিখাৰ পৰা।
arabic: وَخَلَقَ ٱلۡجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٖ مِّن نَّارٖ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqa al-jāna min mārijin min nārin
